WRITING.TITLE: Is it just me, or does xbox run like crap after you expand to everyone?
WRITING.TEXT: The frame rate in the later game is HORRIBLE. I LOVE this game, and would prefer to play it with a controller, but the framerate makes it unplayable. PLEASE make this #1 priority for xbox bug/patch list. (it seems most play on computer in this reddit).

turns out, it was a bad tivo. lightning struck REALLY close by, and took out my receiver, xbox one, and messed up the tivo. it would only work directly into the tv.....but wasn't 'powerful enough' to output to my xbox one. tivo sent me a referb and it fixed everything right up.

WRITING.TITLE: I'd like to take a second and recognize how good Astroneer is.
WRITING.TEXT:
This is what I had hoped for from No Man's Sky. Let's look past the bugs and glitches for a second. I've had few games where i'm genuinly excited for the next 'stage' or step or item. I played with my friend online and we've had several moments where we'd say, 'ok, one more item and i'm off' and 3 hours later we still can't pry ourselves away. Elder scrolls are the only other game i could think of that gave me that feeling. If you haven't downloaded it yet, give it a try.
Oh, did I mention its only 19.99? Double score.
(multiplayer didn't work during the trial for me, i did work once we both bought the game).
